content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```julia
using Statistics

function find_median(arr)
    if length(arr) == 0
        return nothing
    end
    sorted = sort(arr)
    midpoint = floor(Int, (length(sorted) + 1) / 2)
    if length(sorted) % 2 == 0
        return (sorted[midpoint - 1] + sorted[midpoint]) / 2
    else
        return sorted[midpoint]
    end
end
```
Example:
```julia
arr = [1, 3, 5, 7, 9]
median = find_median(arr)
println("Median: $median") # prints "Median: 5"
```
